rnr_en.description: enable bit of radius based noise reduction

snr_en.description: enable bit of skin color based noise reduction

fd_snr_en.description: enable bit of face guided skin color based noise reduction
fd_snr_en.additional_notes: if fd_snr_en = 1, snr is applied on face regions; if fd_snr_en = 0, snr is applied on both face regions and non-face regions

fnr_en.description: enable bit of flatness based noise reduction

lenr_dn4_8_16_bltr_clamp_en_tab.description: BLRT dn4 dn8 dn16 clamp enable
lenr_dn4_8_16_bltr_clamp_en_tab.additional_notes: dn4, dn8, dn16 BLTR clamp enabler as array type

lenr_dn4_8_16_bltr_clamp_p_tab.description: BLRT dn4 dn8 dn16 positive clamp
lenr_dn4_8_16_bltr_clamp_p_tab.additional_notes: dn4, dn8, dn16 BLTR positive clamp value as array type

lenr_dn4_8_16_bltr_clamp_n_tab.description: BLRT dn4 dn8 dn16 negative clamp
lenr_dn4_8_16_bltr_clamp_n_tab.additional_notes: dn4, dn8, dn16 BLTR negative clamp value as array type

lenr_dn4_bltr_fnr_gain_arr_tab.description: gain table for flatness based noise reduction
lenr_dn4_bltr_fnr_gain_arr_tab.additional_notes: LENR BLTR will be stronger as fnr_gain_arr decreases.

lenr_dn8_bltr_fnr_gain_arr_tab.description: gain table for flatness based noise reduction
lenr_dn8_bltr_fnr_gain_arr_tab.additional_notes: LENR BLTR will be stronger as fnr_gain_arr decreases.

lenr_dn16_bltr_fnr_gain_arr_tab.description: gain table for flatness based noise reduction
lenr_dn16_bltr_fnr_gain_arr_tab.additional_notes: LENR BLTR will be stronger as fnr_gain_arr decreases.

lenr_dn4_lce_fnr_gain_arr_tab.description: gain table for flatness based local contrast enhancement
lenr_dn4_lce_fnr_gain_arr_tab.additional_notes: LENR LCE will be stronger as fnr_gain_arr decreases.

lenr_dn8_lce_fnr_gain_arr_tab.description: gain table for flatness based local contrast enhancement
lenr_dn8_lce_fnr_gain_arr_tab.additional_notes: LENR LCE will be stronger as fnr_gain_arr decreases.

lenr_dn16_lce_fnr_gain_arr_tab.description: gain table for flatness based local contrast enhancement
lenr_dn16_lce_fnr_gain_arr_tab.additional_notes: LENR LCE will be stronger as fnr_gain_arr decreases.

lenr_dn4_8_16_bltr_th_tab.description: BLTR dn4 dn8 dn16 weight curve controlthreshold

lenr_dn4_8_16_bltr_gap_tab.description: BLTR dn4 dn8 dn16 weight curve gap (0-10)

lenr_dn4_8_16_bltr_ctrl_th_tab.description: BLTR dn4 dn8 dn16 noise control threshold

lenr_dn4_8_16_bltr_ctrl_w_tab.description: BLTR dn4 dn8 dn16 noise control slope

lenr_dn4_bltr_snr_gain_arr_tab.description: skin based noise reduction gain table
lenr_dn4_bltr_snr_gain_arr_tab.additional_notes: LENR BLTR will be stronger as snr_gain_arr decreases. SW tuning parameter need subtract by 1 and set it to HW register.

lenr_dn8_bltr_snr_gain_arr_tab.description: skin based noise reduction gain table
lenr_dn8_bltr_snr_gain_arr_tab.additional_notes: LENR BLTR will be stronger as snr_gain_arr decreases. SW tuning parameter need subtract by 1 and set it to HW register.

lenr_dn16_bltr_snr_gain_arr_tab.description: skin based noise reduction gain table
lenr_dn16_bltr_snr_gain_arr_tab.additional_notes: LENR BLTR will be stronger as snr_gain_arr decreases. SW tuning parameter need subtract by 1 and set it to HW register.

bltr_rnr_gain_arr_tab.description: radial adjustment for noise preserving percentage
bltr_rnr_gain_arr_tab.additional_notes: LENR BLTR will be stronger denoising as bltr_rnr_gain_arr decreases. In general, bltr_rnr_gain_arr is a monotonically decreasing curve.

lenr_dn4_8_16_lce_core_p_tab.description: LCE dn4 dn8 dn16 HPF positive coring

lenr_dn4_8_16_lce_core_n_tab.description: LCE dn4 dn8 dn16 HPF negative coring

lenr_dn4_8_16_lce_scale_p_tab.description: LCE dn4 dn8 dn16 HPF positive scaling

lenr_dn4_8_16_lce_scale_n_tab.description: LCE dn4 dn8 dn16 HPF negative scaling

lenr_dn4_8_16_lce_clamp_p_tab.description: LCE dn4 dn8 dn16 HPF positive clamping

lenr_dn4_8_16_lce_clamp_n_tab.description: LCE dn4 dn8 dn16 HPF negative clamping

lenr_dn4_lce_snr_gain_arr_tab.description: skin based local contrast enhancement gain table
lenr_dn4_lce_snr_gain_arr_tab.additional_notes: LENR LCE will be stronger as snr_gain_arr decreases. SW tuning parameter need subtract by 1 and set it to HW register.

lenr_dn8_lce_snr_gain_arr_tab.description: skin based local contrast enhancement gain table
lenr_dn8_lce_snr_gain_arr_tab.additional_notes: LENR LCE will be stronger as snr_gain_arr decreases. SW tuning parameter need subtract by 1 and set it to HW register.

lenr_dn16_lce_snr_gain_arr_tab.description: skin based local contrast enhancement gain table
lenr_dn16_lce_snr_gain_arr_tab.additional_notes: LENR LCE will be stronger as snr_gain_arr decreases. SW tuning parameter need subtract by 1 and set it to HW register.

lce_rnr_gain_arr_tab.description: radial adjustment for local contrast enhancment percentage
lce_rnr_gain_arr_tab.additional_notes: LENR LCE will be stronger enhancement as lce_rnr_gain_arr decreases. In general, lce_rnr_gain_arr is a monotonically decreasing curve.

skin_hue_min.description: Min hue value for skin detection. Instead of negative (Cb/Cr), absolute value |Cb/Cr| is used in HW

skin_hue_max.description: Max hue value for skin detection. Instead of negative (Cb/Cr), absolute value |Cb/Cr| is used in HW

skin_y_min.description: Min Y value for skin detection.

skin_y_max.description: Max Y value for skin detection

skin_saturation_min_y_max.description: Min saturation value for skin when Y=Y_max

skin_saturation_max_y_max.description: Max saturation value for skin when Y=Y_max

skin_saturation_min_y_min.description: Min saturation value for skin when Y=Y_min

skin_saturation_max_y_min.description: Max saturation value for skin when Y=Y_min

skin_boundary_probability.description: skin-tone probability at the boundary of skin-tone range

skin_percent.description: Percentage of skin tone region with skin-tone probability 1

face_boundary.description: the lower bound of face region. Full skin detection is applied within radius smaller than face_boundary * face_radius(from face detection).

face_transition.description: the upper bound of face region. no skin detection is applied within radius larger than face_transition * face_radius(from face detection).

lenr_dn4_8_16_bltr_th_tab.description: BLTR dn4 dn8 dn16 weight curve controlthreshold

lenr_dn4_8_16_bltr_gap_tab.description: BLTR dn4 dn8 dn16 weight curve gap (0-10)

lenr_dn4_8_16_bltr_ctrl_th_tab.description: BLTR dn4 dn8 dn16 noise control threshold

lenr_dn4_8_16_bltr_ctrl_w_tab.description: BLTR dn4 dn8 dn16 noise control slope

bltr_rnr_gain_arr_tab.description: radial adjustment for noise preserving percentage
bltr_rnr_gain_arr_tab.additional_notes: LENR BLTR will be stronger denoising as bltr_rnr_gain_arr decreases. In general, bltr_rnr_gain_arr is a monotonically decreasing curve.

lenr_dn4_8_16_lce_core_p_tab.description: LCE dn4 dn8 dn16 HPF positive coring

lenr_dn4_8_16_lce_core_n_tab.description: LCE dn4 dn8 dn16 HPF negative coring

lenr_dn4_8_16_lce_scale_p_tab.description: LCE dn4 dn8 dn16 HPF positive scaling

lenr_dn4_8_16_lce_scale_n_tab.description: LCE dn4 dn8 dn16 HPF negative scaling

lenr_dn4_8_16_lce_clamp_p_tab.description: LCE dn4 dn8 dn16 HPF positive clamping

lenr_dn4_8_16_lce_clamp_n_tab.description: LCE dn4 dn8 dn16 HPF negative clamping

lenr_dn4_lce_snr_gain_arr_tab.description: skin based local contrast enhancement gain table
lenr_dn4_lce_snr_gain_arr_tab.additional_notes: LENR LCE will be stronger as snr_gain_arr decreases. SW tuning parameter need subtract by 1 and set it to HW register.

lenr_dn8_lce_snr_gain_arr_tab.description: skin based local contrast enhancement gain table
lenr_dn8_lce_snr_gain_arr_tab.additional_notes: LENR LCE will be stronger as snr_gain_arr decreases. SW tuning parameter need subtract by 1 and set it to HW register.

lenr_dn16_lce_snr_gain_arr_tab.description: skin based local contrast enhancement gain table
lenr_dn16_lce_snr_gain_arr_tab.additional_notes: LENR LCE will be stronger as snr_gain_arr decreases. SW tuning parameter need subtract by 1 and set it to HW register.

lce_rnr_gain_arr_tab.description: radial adjustment for local contrast enhancment percentage
lce_rnr_gain_arr_tab.additional_notes: LENR LCE will be stronger enhancement as lce_rnr_gain_arr decreases. In general, lce_rnr_gain_arr is a monotonically decreasing curve.

skin_hue_min.description: Min hue value for skin detection. Instead of negative (Cb/Cr), absolute value |Cb/Cr| is used in HW

skin_hue_max.description: Max hue value for skin detection. Instead of negative (Cb/Cr), absolute value |Cb/Cr| is used in HW

skin_y_min.description: Min Y value for skin detection.

skin_y_max.description: Max Y value for skin detection

skin_saturation_min_y_max.description: Min saturation value for skin when Y=Y_max

skin_saturation_max_y_max.description: Max saturation value for skin when Y=Y_max

skin_saturation_min_y_min.description: Min saturation value for skin when Y=Y_min

skin_saturation_max_y_min.description: Max saturation value for skin when Y=Y_min

skin_boundary_probability.description: skin-tone probability at the boundary of skin-tone range

skin_percent.description: Percentage of skin tone region with skin-tone probability 1

face_boundary.description: the lower bound of face region. Full skin detection is applied within radius smaller than face_boundary * face_radius(from face detection).

face_transition.description: the upper bound of face region. no skin detection is applied within radius larger than face_transition * face_radius(from face detection).

lenr_dn4_8_16_bltr_th_tab.description: BLTR dn4 dn8 dn16 weight curve controlthreshold

lenr_dn4_8_16_bltr_gap_tab.description: BLTR dn4 dn8 dn16 weight curve gap (0-10)

lenr_dn4_8_16_bltr_ctrl_th_tab.description: BLTR dn4 dn8 dn16 noise control threshold

lenr_dn4_8_16_bltr_ctrl_w_tab.description: BLTR dn4 dn8 dn16 noise control slope

lenr_dn4_bltr_snr_gain_arr_tab.description: skin based noise reduction gain table
lenr_dn4_bltr_snr_gain_arr_tab.additional_notes: LENR BLTR will be stronger as snr_gain_arr decreases. SW tuning parameter need subtract by 1 and set it to HW register.

lenr_dn8_bltr_snr_gain_arr_tab.description: skin based noise reduction gain table
lenr_dn8_bltr_snr_gain_arr_tab.additional_notes: LENR BLTR will be stronger as snr_gain_arr decreases. SW tuning parameter need subtract by 1 and set it to HW register.

lenr_dn16_bltr_snr_gain_arr_tab.description: skin based noise reduction gain table
lenr_dn16_bltr_snr_gain_arr_tab.additional_notes: LENR BLTR will be stronger as snr_gain_arr decreases. SW tuning parameter need subtract by 1 and set it to HW register.

bltr_rnr_gain_arr_tab.description: radial adjustment for noise preserving percentage
bltr_rnr_gain_arr_tab.additional_notes: LENR BLTR will be stronger denoising as bltr_rnr_gain_arr decreases. In general, bltr_rnr_gain_arr is a monotonically decreasing curve.

lenr_dn4_8_16_lce_core_p_tab.description: LCE dn4 dn8 dn16 HPF positive coring

lenr_dn4_8_16_lce_core_n_tab.description: LCE dn4 dn8 dn16 HPF negative coring

lenr_dn4_8_16_lce_scale_n_tab.description: LCE dn4 dn8 dn16 HPF negative scaling

lenr_dn4_8_16_lce_clamp_p_tab.description: LCE dn4 dn8 dn16 HPF positive clamping

lenr_dn4_8_16_lce_clamp_n_tab.description: LCE dn4 dn8 dn16 HPF negative clamping

lenr_dn4_lce_snr_gain_arr_tab.additional_notes: LENR LCE will be stronger as snr_gain_arr decreases. SW tuning parameter need subtract by 1 and set it to HW register.

skin_hue_max.description: Max hue value for skin detection. Instead of negative (Cb/Cr), absolute value |Cb/Cr| is used in HW
